author: Eric M
comment: Love it so far. Recommend making settings changes for the watch face with Google Wear app on phone though.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Eric, 
thank you for the feedback. 
We will consider your recommendations during our meeting. ^^ 
We will do our best to fulfill your expectations, if you have any questions / issues please contact us via email (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) and we will be happy to help you out. 
Thank you and best regards.

author: Chris McClellan
comment: Beautiful

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Chris. 
Thank you for rating us :D
We will do our best to fulfill your expectations and hope to release more watchfaces in the future. 
Please keep supporting us! If you have any questions / issues to report while using WatchMaster please contact us via email (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com). 
Thank you and best regards.

author: Tim Kratzke
comment: Only issue I have noticed is while using on the Huewei watch the ambient display when set to "full" will drift slightly off center.  Not sure if this is specific to the face or a watch problem.
title: Great Watch Face

author: Russell Richardson
comment: You can hardly see the status icons (disconnected, dnd, etc) on the day face... :( seems like it could be an easy fix, and hope it can be fixed.
title: Good watch face but...

author: Jerome Mettetal
comment: Love the watch face. It is clean and easy to read. Developer has excellent response to emails. It also looks like battery drain is improved using this watch face, at least at first look. I will know more in a few days.
title: Great watch face

author: Richard Thompson
comment: Great watch face. I haven't switched it out since installing. Very crisp display. Shame about it being soo dull when active tho.
title: Clean, crisp

author: Risvi Yoosuf
comment: Phone battery level doesn't work please fix it
title: Phone battery metre got problem

author: J D
comment: Keeps giving me an error that its stopped working. Refund.
title: Not working

author: Gustavo Sanabria
comment: Very nice, daylight and nightlight modes available. Watch battery gauge. Would give 5 stars if more customization becomes available.
title: Simple and elegant

author: Juan Castaneda
comment: Looks okay. Not alot but a fair number of options. Wish I could get rid of that 8. Seems to be a battery drainer.
title: Battery Drainer

author: Miles Atkinson
comment: I like the black face - how do I get the white one? Huawei Watch

author: AC Jay
comment: Beautifully designed watch face... This is currently my everyday piece.. Thanks!!!
title: Awesome Watchface for Moto360 2G!!

author: brian espinosa
comment: One of the best designed faces I've seen
title: Nice one

author: Gus Grinch
comment: Elegant!

author: Mateusz Traczyk
comment: I was very happy when I found out you can finally permanently set the time face to the night theme. But I was very sad when I found out that it doesn't actually work. I'm using a Moto 360.
title: Almost perfect

author: Scott Hoelle
comment: This is my current watch face and I've used it since the day it came out about a month ago.  Highly recommend.  Only thing to make it better for some is the option to turn off night mode, but I like the transition.
title: Love it

author: Peter Janak
comment: This watchface is excellent, but I wish there was a way to disable the nighttime mode. If that was added to the settings, this would get 5 stars.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: The following function is now added on our WatchMaster app! Download our app on Google Play Store and you'll have more customizing options for the watchface. Thank you for your time and feedback :)

author: Ryan Callihan
comment: Definitely a quick favorite of mine. It'd be nice to have the option to change the accent color and manually use the night mode version.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hi! 
The following function is now added on our WatchMaster app! Download our app on Google Play Store and you'll have more customizing options for the watchface. Thank you for your time and feedback :)

title: Top Notch

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Would like the option to use the night mode face all the time.

author: Jared Kortje
comment: Love the watchface but I agree with the others, I would like to be able to disable night mode.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: The following function is now added on our WatchMaster app! Download our app on Google Play Store and you'll have more customizing options for the watchface. Thank you for your time and feedback :)
